> > ** Replies from J. B. Rainsberger are unwelcome
> 
> Am I the only person who considers this really, really rude?
> 

You are not alone!

Not only do I find it *extremely* rude, but there has been no reason
given for this dislike of J.B.'s opinion.  (Take note that I have *not*
asked for a reason, I have just stated that none has been given.)

Not only has no reason been given, but this is a public forum, and, as
such, you are going to get anyone's opinion on whatever you post.  As a
matter of fact, I find J.B.'s comments very informative most of the
time, and greatly value his contribution to this, and other forums.

If you really dislike anyone's opinion on this list (it *is* allowed,
you know!) just don't read their posts!  That simple!

I believe in civility, and usenet etiquette.

Manuel Amago.
